about_the_game:
It’s not all smooth sailing out on the mainline. Explore more gameplay and unique operations on Rivet Games’ ScotRail Express route, with newly liveried Class 66s joining ranks alongside the Class 385. From engineering movements to daring drags, expand your Edinburgh - Glasgow experience in Train Sim World 4.

The commuter lines between Scotland’s two primary cities are bustling and frequent, and with the introduction of electrification and all new EMUs, rapid and efficient. As important as the operation of trains is the upkeep of the line, track must be kept in good condition and backup options needed should anything untoward occur.

Embark on the task of shifting hefty ballast trains along the Edinburgh - Glasgow line, without causing delays, in preparation for day-to-day engineering works, and face typical Scottish weather as you drag Class 385s on delivery and rescue runs.

A sample of ‘sheds’ form the traction for these unique duties, resplendent in 2 brand new liveries! Encompassed in sleek blue, the Class 66 arrives in Direct Rail Services livery, and although not to be ONE-upped, it is accompanied by the pleasing magenta tones of Ocean Network Express livery.

With Train Sim World 4’s Free Roam, take the DRS and ONE Class 66s to other parts of the British Rail network, and haul a selection of stock from other routes in your collection.

Face new challenges and new types of services on Scotland’s principal inter-city mainline with Rivet Games’ Engineering Express Pack!

Key Features

  • BR Class 66 Diesel Locomotive in 2 new liveries:

    • Ocean Network Express (ONE) Magenta

    • Direct Rail Services (DRS) Blue

  • Class 66 features new emergency adapter coupler to drag Class 385 EMUs

  • YGB Seacow wagon in painted blue and unpainted grey liveries

  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cabs

  • True-to-life performance and handling

  • 5 additional Scenarios and an additional Timetable for Edinburgh - Glasgow

  • Additional Journey Mode chapter for Edinburgh - Glasgow

  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club

  • Explore the trains in Free Roam

  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology

  • Download size: 332 MB
